name: Duty Sniper FPS
description:
Duty Sniper FPS is the most popular high-quality 3D FPS game in 2017, in which you will incarnate Battle Soldier, in order to defend the last piece of territory on the island, and the enemy to a real stimulus shootout

Features:
- Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations.
- Tons of thrilling MISSIONS.
- ADDICTING gameplay (FPS).
- EASY and INTUITIVE controls.
